name: Juicy Knife Throw - Hit Splash
description:
Tap to hit the target and collect the juice! Aim to hit the spinning circle, precision counts and don’t make any mistakes! The more knives you dash, the more juice you get. Flip the knives, throw them out, splash the target and collect more juice!

Game Features:
- Dozens of blades with cool design and more to come
- Juice Collection of different fruits
- Simple quick reflex tapping gameplay but really hard to master
- Hundreds of levels to solve, intertwined with all sorts of tweaks and surprises
